preqs: 48 Credit points and with permission by the Unit Coordinator

rules.ruleString: (Permission required and  Must have passed 48 credit points from units owned by {50000562})

description: This unit introduces students to digital publishing within art and design studio practices. It builds sequentially upon the skills and knowledge of electronic design by providing a focus upon digital methods of publication. Students explore digital workflow through a variety of software applications and a range of delivery options for digital publishing with increasing confidence, proficiency and technical understanding of demands required across the development, creation and realisation of networked publishing outcomes.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
